game.name: STRAY CAT
game.shortDescription: Is a game about a homeless cat who decided to save money for a new home. 2D platformer with a side view, where you will play as a brave cat who decided to collect all the coins on his way and destroy evil opponents.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Is a game about a homeless cat who decided to save money for a new home. 2D platformer with a side view, where you will play as a brave cat who decided to collect all the coins on his way and destroy evil opponents.

reviewHighlights.text: [h1] Spray & Stray Time[/h1] A game with an empty Storepage and Community Hub should always warn you. This one has even a misleading letsplay on its h...
